scripts.clean: rm -rf www/* node_modules/ front/auth/bower_components/ front/common/bower_components/ front/main/bower_components/ front/main/node_modules/ server/node_modules/
scripts.clean-deep: npm run clean && npm cache clean && bower cache clean
scripts.setup: npm run setup-root && npm run setup-common && npm run setup-auth && npm run setup-main && npm run setup-server
scripts.setup-main: cd front/main && npm install && bower update
scripts.setup-server: cd server && npm install && cd .. && gulp build-server-init-config
scripts.build-prod: rm -rf www/* && gulp build-common --type prod && gulp build-auth --type prod && cd front/main && ember build -prod && cd ../.. && gulp build-server --type prod
scripts.build-dev: rm -rf www/* && gulp build-common && gulp build-auth && cd front/main && ember build && cd ../.. && gulp build-server
scripts.dev: rm -rf www/* && gulp build-common && gulp build-auth && gulp build-server && npm-run-all --parallel watch-auth watch-common watch-main watch-server start-on-change
scripts.dev-auth: rm -rf www/* && gulp build-common && gulp build-auth && gulp build-server && npm-run-all --parallel watch-auth watch-common watch-server start
scripts.dev-main: rm -rf www/* && gulp build-common && gulp build-server && npm-run-all --parallel watch-common watch-main watch-server start-on-change
scripts.restart: npm-run-all --parallel watch-auth watch-common watch-main watch-server start-on-change
scripts.watch-main: cd front/main && rm -rf tmp && ember build --watch
scripts.shrinkwrap: npm run shrinkwrap-root && npm run shrinkwrap-main && npm run shrinkwrap-server
scripts.test: npm run build-dev && npm run test-front && npm run test-server
scripts.test-front: gulp test-common && gulp test-auth && cd front/main && ember test --path ../../www/front/main -tp $(($TEST_PORT + 7357))
scripts.test-server: npm run test-server-unit && npm run test-server-acceptance
scripts.test-server-acceptance: gulp build-server-scripts-for-acceptance-tests && cd server && lab -v tests/acceptance/*.js
